name: Asteronik
description:
___________________________________________________________________

First-person shooter  single-player game 

(Quake and Doom inspired)

____________________________________________________________________

EXT: Explore the orbiting asteroid above earth hunting down the lost artifacts while fending yourself from vicious infected aliens.  

Move through a carefully handcrafted level fighting and exploring the map to reach the teleporter to escape the alien infestation.  Shoot your way through enemies, with a finite supply of ammo and pick up different abilities that enhance gameplay. 

_______________________________________________________________

Made by: Simon Smith, Sammy Gerolaga, Avery Taylor
